name: Zeltlager (early alpha testing)
description:
Please follow me on Twitter and Reddit for updates :D

This is a very early alpha.
UI is only a prototype.
For testing of level-generation and solving only.

(click on the empty tiles to mark them as empty and again to place a tent)

If you encounter problems, please send the number on the buttom in the comments.

This should run fine in your Smartphone-Browser. If not, please tell me which device and brwoser you use. (and of course what the problem is)

Art by kenney.nl
